body_html:
If I remember correctly, I suppose if you don’t specify the remote_cluster, the client runs in independent worker mode, which means all your nodes should run the same Python program but not a standard TF server. I would recommend you to try standalone client mode, which is in effect when you do specify remote_cluster.

PS: I would suggest you to use run_std_tensorflow_server in contrib.distribute package for your workers in standalone client mode.
